alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Brewster County through 800 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 26 miles west of Persimmon Gap, or 38 miles northeast of Big Bend Ranch State Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Brewster County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Texas.
